'''Festive Travel Journal''' is a part of the [[Springtime Charms]] event.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Springtime Charms Festive Travel Journal 1.png
|text1    = The Ministry of Civil Affairs will place various festive toys throughout Liyue Harbor during the Lantern Rite. Visit these toy locations and increase your Festive Travel Journal progress to redeem the corresponding rewards.
|image2   = Tutorial Springtime Charms Festive Travel Journal 2.png
|text2    = In the {{Color|help|Lamplit Entertainment}} menu, you can check on the {{Color|help|location}} of each festive toy within Liyue Harbor.
|image3   = Tutorial Springtime Charms Festive Travel Journal 3.png
|text3    = Use Normal Attacks to activate Fortune Coins and cause them to rotate. Toggle them correctly to increase your Festive Travel Journal progress.
|image4   = Tutorial Springtime Charms Festive Travel Journal 4.png
|text4    = Visit Sightseeing Scopes to catch a glimpse of sights afar. Successfully view these extraordinary vistas to increase your Festive Travel Journal progress.
|image5   = Tutorial Springtime Charms Festive Travel Journal 5.png
|text5    = Use attacks to activate Launch Tubes and cause them to stop rotating to increase your Festive Travel Journal progress. When the Launch Tubes, which have stopped rotating, point toward {{Color|help|specified pictures}}, they can even fire off the corresponding fireworks. If you can cause the Launch Tubes to display 4 identical pictures at the same time, something interesting could happen...
}}
